thread.title: Other people’s embarrassing brain farts will make you feel better about your own (6 Photos)
thread.title_full: Other people’s embarrassing brain farts will make you feel better about your own (6 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Other people’s embarrassing brain farts will make you feel better about your own (6 Photos)
text:
I found myself taking a bath with all my clothes on. Never told anyone. Just went back to sleep. Gentzzz 5 
After an 8 hour day of cashiering at Target(which has so many robotic-small talk conversations), I stopped at the dollar store. The conversation went something like: Cashier: Hi, how are you? Me: Good, how are you? Cashier: I’m good, thanks. Me: That’s good. Did you find everything okay today? That conversation was had to the effect of everyone in line and the cashier looking at me like I was psycho. TAKEYOURCHAIRWITHYOU 
Walked into the bathroom at work to pee, and instead of unzipping my fly, I unbuttoned my dress shirt, took it off, then took off my white undershirt as well. Then realized I was standing shirtless at a urinal and wtf’d. ghettoeskimo _
